item.description:
We'll have two sessions of the play group - 12 - 2 pm, and 2 - 4 pm; RSVP and let me know which one you'd like ato attend!

I'd also like to say that if each household can contribute $5 for a session, that would help me pay for new toys, the space rental, and refreshments.

Also, if anyone has an enclosed outdoor space that we can use at times, starting in June, please let me know at:
laptopmaltese@aol.com.

See you on May 1st!!

Kim

Parking - Especially for Pets has given us our own lots to park in. When you enter the main parking lot, our lot is on the upper left corner, in the back.

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Maltese May Meetup
